Producer: Yoshi Ikezawa, Joseph Chou, Tim Kwok
Screenwriter: Matthew Stuecken, Kiel Murray, Josh Campbell
Production Co: Sony Pictures Entertainment, Convergence Entertainment, Takz Film, Toei Animation, Toei Company, Stage 6 Films, Hero Squared, Sola Entertainment
Synopsis: Based on the international anime sensation, Knights of the Zodiac brings the Saint Seiya saga to the big screen in live-action for the first time. Seiya (Mackenyu), a headstrong street teen, spends his time fighting for cash while he searches for his abducted sister. When one of his fights unwittingly taps into mystical powers he never knew he had, Seiya finds himself thrust into a world of warring saints, ancient magical training and a reincarnated goddess who needs his protection. If heâ€™s to survive, he will need to embrace his destiny and sacrifice everything to take his rightful place among the Knights of the Zodiac.
Title: Knights of the Zodiac
